title: Web-Based Mathematics Professional Development Education: Video Simulation Integrated Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Undergraduate-level foundational mathematics knowledge and professional application experience
context.additional_context: Math job competency enhancement program using smartphone-based video learning modules, with VR simulations providing real-life problem-solving experiences

learning_goals: Learners can apply mathematical modeling techniques with 80% accuracy through web-based video lectures
Perform the process of solving practical problems presented in simulation environments using mathematical approaches at least three times
Enhance decision-making skills by visualizing data analysis results through VR-based interactive tasks

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
